Class TableViewBuilder

java.lang.Object
Util.TableViewBuilder
public class TableViewBuilder extends Object
Utility class to build and populate JavaFX TableView dynamically based on the fields of a given model class.

  • Method Details

    • setupTable

      public static <T> void setupTable(javafx.scene.control.TableView<T> tableView, List<T> data, Class<T> type)
      Sets up the TableView columns and populates it with data. Columns are created for each declared field of the given type.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type parameter of the data
      Parameters:
      tableView - the TableView to setup
      data - the list of data items to display
      type - the class type of the data items
